name: Joanna Gruesome
description: '''Joanna Gruesome''' were a [[Musical ensemble#Five parts 2|five-piece]] [[noise pop]] band from [[Cardiff]], Wales. The name of the group is a reference to musician [[Joanna Newsom]]. They released two albums and a number of singles, were known for their energetic live shows, as well as their forthright [[feminist]] and anti-homophobic views.
